review: I love this product.  The only problem is that because I have a tv with only one hdmi port, I had to also buy an extra cable with multiple ports to allow me to use it along with my tv.  This is the second Fire TV Stick with purchased (for the bedroom tv) because we use the one in the living room every day.  It's easy to use and gives me a wide range of viewing options which are not available on cable or directv.  It was easy to install and ready to use in just a few minutes.  With the snowstorm we had over the weekend, our directv was out of service.  We didn't even notice because we were using the Fire TV Stick all night.  Definitely worth the price.
author: Amazon Customer
